content: round 37 k1 k2tog repeat to end of in stockinette stitch knitting on the rs round even odd row and purling on the ws even row draw working yarn through remaining stitches and pull tightly hair finishing row 29 join white knit row 30 and all ws even row purl refer to page row 31 begin decreases k1 *k4 gingerbread boy straight needle k2tog repeat from * to last stitch k1 variation round 33 k1 *k3 k2tog repeat from * to last stitch k1 loosely cast on 26 stitches in light round 35 k1 *k2 k2tog repeat from * brown leaving a long tail for seaming to last stitch k1 knit from pattern as follows round 37 k1 * k1 k2tog repeat from * feet to last stitch k1 2 follow me on instagram @estherjoyknits for more tips tutorials and project ideas mini gingerbread friends a knitting pattern by esther braithwaite designs draw working yarn through remaining round 16 knit 3 in light brown purl 6 in stitches and pull tightly white knit 6 in light brown purl 6 in white knit 3 in light brown seam doll body using tail from top of head sew the rounds 17-20 continue in light brown sides of the doll together with an knit invisible seam round 21 join white knit finishing round 22 purl refer to page 5 face rounds 23-28 join light brown knit hair gingerbread girl circular knitting round 29-30 join white knit round 31 begin decreases k4 k2tog loosely cast on 24 stitches in white repeat to end of round leaving a long tail for seaming round 32 and all even row knit arrange stitches evenly on 4 needles round 33 k3 k2tog repeat to end of 6 6 6 6 round refer to chart or knit from pattern as round 35 k2 k2tog repeat to end of follows round feet round 37 k1 k2tog repeat to end of rounds 1 - 2 knit round round 3 join light brown knit 8 sts in draw working yarn through remaining white knit 3 sts in light brown knit 2 sts in stitches and pull tightly white knit 3 sts in light brown knit in skirt white to end of round with the doll held upside down pick up round 4 knit 26 stitches from the dolls waist just legs below the cuffs attach light brown yarn rounds 5-14 join light brown knit round 1 k1 kfb continue to end of cuffs row round 15 knit 3 in light brown knit 6 in rounds 2-6 knit white knit 6 in light brown knit 6 in white knit 3 in light brown round 7 join white knit 3 follow me on instagram @estherjoyknits for more tips tutorials and project ideas mini gingerbread friends a knitting pattern by esther braithwaite designs round 8 purl row 16 purl 4 in light brown knit 6 in white purl 6 in light brown knit 6 in round 9 *k2tog yo repeat to end of white purl
